tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_age INT,
    treatment VARCHAR(50),
    treatment_outcome VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  dob DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentOutcomes (
  outcome_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  outcome VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_conducted DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);
CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(100), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), ethnicity VARCHAR(50), date_of_birth DATE)
CREATE TABLE treatments (treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, patient_id UUID, treatment_type VARCHAR(50), treatment_date DATE, outcome VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, trial_name VARCHAR(100), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, phase INT, research_facility VARCHAR(100))

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  race VARCHAR(50),
  enrollment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE outcomes (
  outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  trial_id INT,
  outcome_description TEXT,
  outcome_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    enrollment_date DATE
);
